author: Andrew Griffin, Andrew Griffin
title: WhatsApp 'Martinelli' virus returns in 2020: What to do if you receive strange message about 'WhatsApp gold' video
description: There's no need to worry about the message or its threats
content:
The WhatsApp "Martinelli" video is back. And it doesn't make any sense than it did before.
The message has been circulating across the internet for months, being passed between people who think they are helping out their friends. But it is a scam allbeit a r… [+9445 chars]
